decision_conditions: The applicant is advised that this application only relates to the discharge of conditions relating to planning permission ref: 22116/APP/2019/241, dated 08-11-19.

A separate details application is required for the discharge of conditions relating to the Listed Building Consent ref: 22116/APP/2019/2419, dated 08-11-19. Failure to discharge these conditions could void the granted Listed Building Consent.

It is noted that the applicant is no longer proposing to use anti-fungal paint in the trade kitchen. The applicant is advised that these works were not specified in the description of works in relation to the granted Listed Building Consent (ref: 22116/APP/2019/2419). Should it be required in the future, then such works are likely to require a separate Listed Building Consent application.
description: Details pursuant to Conditions 5 (existing surface finishes), 6 (Paint Finish Removal Methodology Statement), 7 (Keim Paint System), 8 (Black Linseed Oil Product Details), 9 (Replacement LEDs & Brass Cowl Lights), 10 (Lead Code Details), 11 (Fabric Canopy), 12 (Glazed Roof Over Bar Area 3), 13 (New Floor Finishes) and 15 (Anti-fungal Paint Details) of planning permission ref: 22116/APP/2019/2418, dated 08-11-19 (Refurbishment of existing public house, including the removal of later addition food counter to install new traditional drinks counter; pergola to have replacement fabric roof; conservatory roof under drawn with insulation and plasterboard finished in painted plaster leaving the timbers exposed; installation of new drink shelves; and new back fitting to bar)
